answers.answer: A pizza isn't going to make you fail. Its just to see if you test positive for gestational diabetes. (sugar drink).
At what point in pregnancy do you do this? Does everyone do it? Iv heard about it not very much just that it's gross
I bekieve from your 24 to 28 week. Im 26+6 so im within the time frame. And idk about this lol I might have to drink something and be bad oh well lol
Yes when your between 24-28 weeks. I'm 24 weeks, will be 25 Tuesday. I haven't done my yet but I will in the next week or so.
They only test you if you do not already have diabetes. I fortunately never had to drink that stuff as I have type 2 diabetes.
Its not as bad as everyone makes it seem it just taste like flat orange soda not bad at all
I did mine last week at 28w6,the juice isnt bad just taste like really sweet deflated soda lol.
I had a little lolly the other day n gagged I can't stand sweet stuff anymore.But that's alright I got a while yet only 17w5d =P

Believe me when i tell you this. .. I hvnt been eating nything healthy what so ever... N on top of that i eat so much sugary stuff like there is no tomorrow... When i was going for test i did not keep my stomach empty i had nuts at 12 coz i was out of house wiv family n i had to had something... I was 100% i m gna fail also coz of polycystic ovaries...But i passed... Lol i did not eat vegetables at all thru out pregnancy and starting week 21 i was not evn eating fruits... I just started eating bit healthy at 27wks lol...
I go in next week to do it. ill be almost 17 weeks but im getting it done early because im "high risk" (grandparents have diabetes and im Asian...)

I had it because my bmi was higher than it should be. i missed my 2nd one so had it done on the 27th at 8:55 am (morning after my birthday)!! She took my blood then i drank the drink wich tasted like room temp ice tea... it really isnt horrible at all. the wait around for 2 hours and then have more bood taken b4 goin home. The waiting around is the worst bit. so boring. and you can only sip water.. Boring...
Survived the nighy with no good thought I wasnt going to make it. I took the lemon lime one it tadte like sweet sprite. Waiting to do an ultradound and for time to past. Ill update you guys.
Results in: no gd YAY lol baby is healthy and everything is on track.

question: Have it in the morning,  definitely not looking forward to it. Esp. Me not being able to eat for 8 hours. I have 30 minutes left to eat what my heart desires. Ugh. I already know I'm probably going to fail since I just had a large pizza hut pizza to myself and barely Been eating healthy.  Im just curious to see how much weight I've gained. I'm allbaby and  getting big.
title: blah glucose test
